评论详情: I'm a First Responder in EMS. We have buy our own pants, so I decided to give these a try. I've been wearing them on shifts for a couple months now and I love them. Some of the better known brands don't offer lined cargo pants in Navy blue for some reason. But, now I'm glad they don't, because these are my new go-to pants now. I'll be buying more.
This product seems well made and the fleece lining is warm, soft and does a great job protecting from the cold wind.
My husband really liked the fit, the soft lining and warmth. Would recommend!
Material and construction seem fine but they run small both in the waist and leg for 32x32.

This are great pants they are very comfortable and the fit is perfect i have been using this pants for years and i can say that they are a great value for your money specially in the winter. This pants withh keep you nice and warm and you won’t have to worry about nothing.
These pants are great for working men in the cold or damp... they last and are very well made...Expensive but worth it
Fit great and are warm have no issues after several washes still fit the same and seem they will hold up for sometime to come
I really like the fit of these pants, I won't know how warm they are until I try them out the first cold snap but I think I will like them
